title: Sky pulls support for Murdoch bid as Comcast confirms offer
text:
Sky pulls support for Murdoch bid as Comcast confirms offer Wednesday, April 25, 2018 - 01:12
Sky has withdrawn its recommendation of Rupert Murdoch's contested bid for the European pay-TV group after rival Comcast submitted a higher, 22 billion-pound ($31 billion) cash offer on Wednesday. As David Pollard reports, there may now be a bidding war for the European pay-TV group.
Sky has withdrawn its recommendation of Rupert Murdoch's contested bid for the European pay-TV group after rival Comcast submitted a higher, 22 billion-pound ($31 billion) cash offer on Wednesday. As David Pollard reports, there may now be a bidding war for the European pay-TV group. //reut.rs/2HYYtWD
